nodes.text: The A1-R0 Weather Monitor Probe was a type of probe droid used by the Selkath species on the planet Manaan during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. The A1-R0 Probe was used to monitor the surface weather of the planet at surface installations such as the upper section of Genetics Laboratory G-1.

The A1-R0 Weather Monitor Probe appears as a NPC in the Tactical Flashpoint "Depths of Manaan," which was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel in Game Update 2.9: Galactic Strongholds Early Access.
